channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Do’s and Don’ts for Managing Knee Pain
Why Your Body Actually Needs Carbs
item.description: From fueling your brain to powering workouts, carbs are essential for your body. Learn why your body needs them and how to choose the healthiest ones.

item.title: Everyday Chores That Can Help You Burn Calories
5 Anti-Inflammatory Foods To Eat For A Clearer, Healthier Brain
item.description: Step inside a nutritional psychiatrist's brain food kitchen.

item.title: I Worry About My Liver Health — This Product Is Giving Me Peace Of Mind
item.description: It's better than every other option I've tried.

item.title: Simple Hacks The Pros Swear By To Keep Their Skin Supple & Soft
item.description: Right now, I'm relying on these skin care hacks—as they're approved by dermatologists, aestheticians, and skin care enthusiasts.

item.title: Don't Ignore This Sneaky Sign You're Going Through A Spiritual Awakening
3 Actionable Ways To Be Genuinely Happy, According To Scott Galloway
item.description: There's no one road on the journey to happiness, but some experts have come pretty close to cracking the code.
